actions.name: Covert

cost.trigger: The user rolls a Stealth Skill Test to hide or obscure itself from view.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user rolls a Stealth Skill Test to hide or obscure itself from view.

Effect: The user automatically succeeds the triggering roll and gains +1 DEF and SPDEF for 5 Activations.
